subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey shut down Boston for six innings, but the Red Sox responded with a three-run seventh and went ahead for good on a 10th inning inside-the-park home run by catcher Blake Swihart.
snippet: Matt Harvey shut down Boston for six innings, but the Red Sox responded with a three-run seventh and went ahead for good on a 10th inning inside-the-park home run by catcher Blake Swihart.
